description:
あいてを　たおすと　トレーナーとの
きずなが　ふかまり　サトシゲッコウガに
へんげする。みずしゅりけんが　つよくなる。
effect:
Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.
